command.label: Validate

command.label: Exact Match Filtering
command.tooltip: Display the nodes that exactly match the filter (their names start with filter value); otherwise display all the nodes which names or assigned types match the filter value

command.label: Link with Navigator

command.tooltip: Link with Navigator (single click will update the Documentation View; otherwise double click or refresh the view to synchronize with Model Navigator)
